title: We need an old lady.
body:
Right now we've got one old guy ({{champion:26}}) but no old HUMAN lady.

We need an old lady who can open up a can of whoop ass on her laner. Or maybe she can be a jungler, and just pop outta nowhere and smack you with something. She should have some kind of in(un, in, i'm not sure)conventional weapon, like a frying pan, or an umbrella, or a cane. but anyway, that's my two cents.

replies.body: {{champion:127}} is like, centuries old

{{champion:25}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:16}} 
All of them probably really old.
{{champion:103}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:143}} Also really old.

> [{quoted}](name=R4GD0LL,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=z3U3hQmL,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-04-30T18:48:27.023+0000)
>
> {{champion:103}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:143}} Also really old.

and none of them human
Why should human matter? Nobody in universe cares much one way or another whether someone is human, yordle, or... whatever.
yordle? i think the term you're looking for is little person.
Dwarf* Minus the beard and fat.
It matters to the players. I personally find it freaky that it's really rare to find a woman who looks to be over 40 in any medium.
ahri is close(est)...
some kinda racist mutha trucka

> [{quoted}](name=R4GD0LL,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=z3U3hQmL,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-04-30T18:48:27.023+0000)
>
> {{champion:103}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:143}} Also really old.

lulu isn't old? and so aren't zyra and ahri they have nothing saying their old in their lore

Lulu is, if you read her lore, from centuries ago- and while she didn't age wherever she was taken, she didn't stop existing during that time. 
Zyra is literally a sentient, ageless carnivorous plant that got up and walked away after she'd eatern EVERYTHING IN HER HOME. 
And Ahri has 9 tails; according to kitsune and gumiho lore, that makes her about 900 years old.

yeah but according to ahris lore shes a fox who turned into a human with fox features

she might be based off of those lores but ahri is ahri not gumiho or kitsune

shes how old you want her to be

and if you want her to be then she can be old as fuck

> [{quoted}](name=R4GD0LL,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=z3U3hQmL,comment-id=00020000000000010000,timestamp=2015-05-01T03:11:55.475+0000)
>
> Lulu is, if you read her lore, from centuries ago- and while she didn't age wherever she was taken, she didn't stop existing during that time. 
> Zyra is literally a sentient, ageless carnivorous plant that got up and walked away after she'd eatern EVERYTHING IN HER HOME. 
> And Ahri has 9 tails; according to kitsune and gumiho lore, that makes her about 900 years old.

mhm k ahris is noncannon but is most likely true i get idk about lulu and zyras lore so k
Yes, but they don't look old. Also, She doesn't look human either. I know she is human, but she doesn't look human.

Zilean doesn't look old either. 

{{champion:26}} 

Does this look like the face of a 80 year old man? 

Maybe in the Micheal Bay universe but not Runeterra. (I really hate that name)

https://i.imgur.com/ksFWRBD.jpg

I think a giant cat litter scoop qualifies as *un*conventional.

How about a witch?

Anyone actually opposed to getting a creepy witch champion, have her do something like Yorick, OH. Maybe something to do with Voodoo dolls. 


... I really want a new shadow isle champion.
She could have a single target "karthus" ult. A needle that flies down from the sky impaling and rooting a single target.

I don't care what they do for her, I really want them to make a new champion I will play. 

Back in October during the Harrowing reveal cinematic I wanted a guy like the old guy, who summoned ghosts or whatever he does at the end. I just want some more scares.
they could rework yorick to be like that

I like Yoricks undead ghoul raising persona, and Meddler commented that the team liked it too. 

I rather a separate new champion, Witch could be a mid laner for example.

Specifically, we need an old lady that actually _looks_ her age. Perhaps something like Garen's former drill instructor, who tossed him on his ass repeatedly and could probably still do that if she felt so inclined.

I vote for this lady:
we need that as a fiora skin! Her 40(?) years from now... maybe time warped fiora? she could get a VO and everything!

> [{quoted}](name=Gati0420,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=z3U3hQmL,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2015-04-30T22:17:58.115+0000)
>
> we need that as a fiora skin! Her 40(?) years from now... maybe time warped fiora? she could get a VO and everything!

Timewarped skins incoming!
Featuring 
"Seasoned" Duelist Fiora - Picture above image
Lee Sin the Blind _and_ Deaf Monk - Lee with a cane and an old ear trumpet
Ezreal the Prodigal "Herbert" (Family Guy reference) - Bathrobes.... 
http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140420142359/family-guy-the-quest-for-stuff/images/6/6f/Facespace_portrait_herbert_default@4x.png
Popcorn Diet Gragas - 
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/streetfighter/images/3/3d/Rufus-Street_Fighter_IV-fixed.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20080605222554
Teenage Annie - maybe this, 
http://lol.gameguyz.ru/sites/default/files/hero/skins/Annie/Cute%20Annie%20Skin%20download/Cute%20Annie%20Skin%20download-1.jpg

I find those skins actually pretty funny. 

Though, didn't Riot say Teen Annie wouldn't happen? I could swear that was somewhere, but I might be mis-remembering.
{{champion:43}} is an Ionian elder so there's that.
but she looks like 20 years old
She looked at least 30 as old karma :(
I don't know why, but Yubaba from Spirited Away was my first thought

We have all sorts of characters: a couple children, a preteen, some beautiful young women, some gorgeous young men, some middle ages dudes, some real old dudes.... But no older women. I totally agree with this. Someone who will smack you with something and criticize you for the way you dress.
{{champion:127}} is incredibly old.

Pretty sure the OP was looking for an actually visibly Old champion who happens to be female. There's lots of really old champions, but honestly how many of them look like they could be your badass grandmother?
^Exactly.

Crazy old poro lady

She controls a swarm of poros.

That is all
we need a fat girl
How do you count Zilean? hes connected to some machinery thus cyborg, not human.
Well if you want an old lady.... You can always count on Big Bad{{champion:19}} :D jungle, sustain and old lady claws xD

I would recommend Ryze's hag mentor Lilith as the new champ.
Just read how she talks with him.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Ryze/Background
{{champion:6}}  ?
I've always wanted an old hag champion, preferably a support that steals buffs, does AoE debuffs, has some interaction with potions and does DoT spells. Basically {{champion:117}} + {{champion:50}}

I vote we call her "Grandma."

A melee support/fighter

Q - Rolling Pin: Swings a rolling ping. Slows an enemy if hit, or can be used to deflect projectiles (but only one!).
W - Milk and Cookies: A healing skillshot, but can be selfcast. Gives ally a small moving debuff (maybe 5% tops), but heals decently. If it hits an enemy, it heals them slightly but gives them a bigger slow debuff. Boosts damage of her Q in its duration, enough to offset the amount healed and then some.
E - Shopping Cart: Roll down a straight line for a brief amount, higher MS but cannot change direction. Can catch allies or enemies, but does not deal damage. Boosts the damage of her next aa. 

R - Crazy Cat Lady: For each level put in, a cat follows Grandma around. When activated, cats become agitated and attack nearby enemies while Grandma gains additional MR and Armor for 10 seconds (could be reduced). If cast near allies with no enemies within 300 range, cats instead become pleasant and purr, giving allies a small heal and defensive buff for 10(?) seconds.

This is why i'm not working for Riot.

Yet.

I'm thinking about doing a Vietnamese rice farmer lady with a bamboo hat who is elderly. She has a giant old fashioned "Libra" styled scale full of harvested plants attached behind her back. She would be a very good BOT-SUPP/MID-LANE Mage who can heal and throw "conjured scythes" at enemies. Her main theme would be "balance." Too racist? Anyone like this idea?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uiUsadMhWgE

I'd pay to have her as the next new champion.

Her special dialogue after killing {{champion:107}} :

"You're a bad kitty!"
Maybe like some old witch lady???????
Grandma {{champion:19}} already exists.

Isn't LeBlanc's entire appearance an illusion itself? She seems like she could be in her 40s for some reason. I just don't imagine her being between 20-30 years at all. Not exactly an old lady, but probably more mature than the rest of the humans.
Typical old shaman lady from the swamps.  The weird crazy ones that you always see about.  A witch.  New AP Jungler?
Why.
How about an old witch-like character that mixes some wild potions/elixirs with all kinds of ingredients?
